title: Concitor Reversible Belt Solid Colors & Black Bonded Leather Silver-Tone Buckle
features: 2 in 1 Concitor Clothing Brand Belt Reversible Belt, Colorful Selection of Belts on One Side and Formal Black on the Other Side
Beautifully Finished Silver-Tone Clip on Removable Buckle with Fine Concitor Brand Engraving
Stand Out Colors of Durable and Classy Men's Dress Belts at an Amazing Value Prices

Don't be Limited with Basic Colors Only, These Belts Offer Both Black and Radiant Colors in One. Match your Red Outfit, Wear them with your Green Pants, Pair them with your Pink Shirts or White Shoes. Large Selection of Hard to Find Colors.
US Sizes, Generous size Length. Belts Available in Big and Tall Sizes, Up to size 60 inch Waist
description: Concitor Clothing Reversible Bonded Leather Men's Belt with Silver Color Buckle.This mens dress belt is available in a large variety of colors. Unique Concitor brand belts that are versatile, wear the vivid stand out color one day then flip the belt and wear the Black Color belt the next. Available in 15 colors: Black, Red, Blue, Brown, Charcoal, Gold, White, Dusty Rose Pink, Hot Pink, Neon Green, Aqua Green, Yellow, Off White, Burgundy, Emerald Green and Purple Indigo. The width of the belt is 30mm (approximately 1.2 inches) strong and genuine bonded leather. The belt size is measured in inches from the buckle to the 3rd hole on the belt with a total of 5 holes on the belt. The buckle is removable, so it can be removed to shorten the belt or you can put on a buckle from another one of your belts. The elegant design makes this a perfect men's belt to wear with a suit for work, special event, or with casual attire such as jeans. Make your outfit stand out and let this radiant belt be the centerpiece. Concitor belts mean business and fun, great belts to wear on the Golf course, represent your Bowling team colors, complete your Halloween costume or show off your stand out shoes with a matching belt. We understand that there is also time for business, flip this reversble belt and use the Black side.
